product_name: Green Guru Dutchy Recycled Banner Single Pannier
long_description: Like a trunk for your bicycle, the Green Guru Dutchy Recycled Banner bike pannier converts your bike into a veritable station wagon for hauling your gear. Fabric is made of recycled billboards and banners and PET (plastic soda bottles) with nylon for durable, weather-ready storage. Large main compartment stows your gear, groceries and other goodies; large main pocket keeps things organized. Universal mount system fits most bike racks. Reflective loop lets you attach a safety light (sold separately). Modeled after the Dutch-style bike panniers, the Green Guru Dutchy Recycled Banner pannier can be removed easily and used as a tote for your gear while on foot.
short_description: Like a trunk for your bicycle, the Green Guru Dutchy Recycled Banner bike pannier converts your bike into a veritable station wagon for hauling your gear.
